com.adobe.cq.social.commons.tagging

Interface SocialTagManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TagManager

    public interface SocialTagManager
extends TagManager
    SocialTagManager is an extension to TagManager interface for Adobe Cloud Storage.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.day.cq.tagging.TagManager

        TagManager.FindResults

    • Method Detail

      • isUserGeneratedTag

        boolean isUserGeneratedTag(java.lang.String tagID)
        Verifies the creator of tag was indeed a user, not an admin nor moderator.
        Parameters:
        tagID - can be the name/ID mytag or namespace:group/tag or the absolute path to resource.
        Returns:
        true if a user created the tag, otherwise false

      • isFlaggedForModeration

        boolean isFlaggedForModeration(java.lang.String tagID)
        Returns true if the given tag was marked for moderation.
        Parameters:
        tagID - can be the name/ID mytag or namespace:group/tag or the absolute path to resource.
        Returns:
        true if tag was flagged for moderation, otherwise false or if tag was not user generated

      • flagForModeration

        void flagForModeration(Tag tag)
        Flags the given tag for moderation.
        Parameters:
        tag - a user generated tag

      • removeModerationFlag

        void removeModerationFlag(Tag tag)
        Removes the moderation flag of a tag.
        Parameters:
        tag - a user generated tag that was flagged

      • canCreateUserGeneratedTag

        boolean canCreateUserGeneratedTag(java.lang.String tagID)
                           throws InvalidTagFormatException
        Verifies if the user, of the current session, can create a tag in the user generated space. This is not the same as TagManager's canCreateTag, which is not for user generated tags.
        Parameters:
        tagID - can be the name/ID mytag or namespace:group/tag or the absolute path to resource.
        Returns:
        true if the user has the needed permissions, false otherwise
        Throws:
        InvalidTagFormatException - if tagID doen't adhere to formating rules

      • createUserGeneratedTag

        Tag createUserGeneratedTag(java.lang.String tagID)
                    throws InvalidTagFormatException
        Creates a tag or namespace in the use generated space.
        Parameters:
        tagID - Can be the absolute path or tag name/ID such as myTag or namespace:group/myTag. Namespaces can also be defined as absolute path or by the name/ID syntax as such myNameSpace:
        Returns:
        the newly created tag
        Throws:
        InvalidTagFormatException - if tagID doen't adhere to formating rules

      • getUserGeneratedNamespaces

        Tag[] getUserGeneratedNamespaces()
        Retrieves all available tag namespaces, in the user generated space, as array.
        Returns:
        all user generated tag namespaces

      • addTagsTo

        void addTagsTo(Resource resource,
               Tag[] tags)
        Add on or multiple tags to a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - an existing resource that may already have tags
        tags - an array of tags

      • removeTagsFrom

        void removeTagsFrom(Resource resource,
                    Tag[] tags)
        Removes one or multiple tags from a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - an resource an existing resource
        tags - an array of tags

      • removeAllTagsFrom

        void removeAllTagsFrom(Resource resource)
        Removes all tags from a resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the tags to remove all its tags

      • resolveRawTagByPath

        Tag resolveRawTagByPath(java.lang.String absPath)
        Returns the tag based on the resource at the given exact repository path. Does not handle if the tag has been moved.
        Parameters:
        absPath - absolute path to tag resource, such as /content/cq:tags/namespace/mytag
        Returns:
        a SocialTagImpl instance for the tag resources stored at the given path, null if not found

      • searchWordsToTags

        Tag[] searchWordsToTags(java.lang.String[] searchWords,
                        boolean isUserGenerated)
        Resolves search words to tags.
        Parameters:
        searchWords - an array of search terms which a user entered
        isUserGenerated - whether to resolve in the user generated path, if true, otherwise in the base CQ path.
        Returns:
        An array of all matching tags from all namespaces. An empty array may be returned if no matching tags were found.

      • searchWordsToTags

        Tag[] searchWordsToTags(java.lang.String[] searchWords,
                        boolean isUserGenerated,
                        java.util.Locale locale)
        Resolves search words to tags, while taking in consideration of the locale.
        Parameters:
        searchWords - an array of search terms which a user entered
        isUserGenerated - whether to resolve in the user generated path, if true, otherwise in the base CQ path.
        locale - the local to use while resolving the tags.
        Returns:
        An array of all matching tags from all namespaces. An empty array may be returned if no matching tags were found.

      • getTagFacetForSubtree

        java.util.Map<Tag,java.lang.Integer> getTagFacetForSubtree(Resource resource)
        Get the tag facet for the specified target
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource
        Returns:
        a map whose keys are the tags, and the values are the count.

      • findTagIDsByTitle

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> findTagIDsByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Call TagManager.findByTitle(String) and return a list of tagIDs instead of TagManager.FindResults
        Parameters:
        title - title of tag to find
        Returns:
        A List of TagIDs or an empty List if nothing found
